title: The Planetary Boundaries Fresco - Online -
description:
Planetary Boundaries:
Do you know the boundaries of the planet we call ‚Äúhome‚Äù? Join this online public workshop to discover the Planetary Boundaries (or deepen your understanding of them) and find out what makes our planet habitable.
During this interactive workshop, you will discover all the processes compromising our planet‚Äôs habitability, gain a better understanding of the global environmental challenges humanity faces, and collectively work towards systemic solutions to avoid planetary overshoot.

L'atelier vise aussi √† expliquer les grandes lignes des actions pour un num√©rique plus durable, puis √† ouvrir des discussions entre les participant¬∑es sur le sujet.

title: EN LIGNE - Fresque de la Biodiversit√© (FR) - avec Anne-Sophie Lemaistre
description:
La Fresque de la Biodiversit√© est un atelier ludique et coop√©ratif qui a pour but de sensibiliser les participants aux enjeux de la Biodiversit√©.
Au cours de cet atelier, vous d√©couvrirez le fonctionnement des √©cosyst√®mes, le r√¥le de la Biodiversit√© pour l'humanit√©, les interactions avec les activit√©s humaines et les menaces li√©es √† son √©rosion.
Cet atelier aura lieu en ligne, en utilisant un outil de visioconf√©rence (Zoom) et un outil de collaboration visuelle (MURAL). La participation √† cet atelier n√©cessite donc un ordinateur avec micro.
Les informations de connexion seront envoy√©es par mail avant l'atelier.
  La participation √† l'atelier est √† prix libre avec un minimum de 10‚Ç¨. Les montants r√©colt√©s sont destin√©s √† financer les outils de la Fresque, des actions de sensibilisation ainsi que le d√©veloppement du r√©seau de la Fresque de la Biodiversit√©.
  Le prix libre, ce n'est pas la gratuit√© syst√©matique. C'est une estimation au plus juste entre vos possibilit√©s, votre situation financi√®re personnelle et la valorisation du temps, du travail et des comp√©tences de la personne qui d√©livre l'atelier ou la formation. C'est un principe de confiance et d'√©quit√© qui nous permet aussi de construire un autre mod√®le de soci√©t√© plus juste et plus solidaire. Par cons√©quent, merci d'envisager votre participation en toute conscience. 
  Dur√©e 3h00
15 min Pr√©sentation du concept + Icebreaker + Prise en main de l'outil Mural
30 min Ap√©ro pour comprendre le m√©canisme des √©cosyst√®mes 
75 min de Fresque de la Biodiversit√© et ses 5 lots de 40 cartes
30 min de cr√©ativit√© pour personnaliser et faire √©merger des √©motions
30 min de restitution & d√©brief & √©change

title: Mural de la Biodiversidad - EN LINEA (ES) - Con Anne-Sophie Masson
description:
Mural de la Biodiversidad en linea 

El Mural de la Biodiversidad es un taller l√∫dico y cooperativo que pretende concienciar sobre lo que est√° en juego con el colapso de la biodiversidad.

Durante este taller, descubrir√°s  el rol que juega la Biodiversidad para el bienestar de la Humanidad, y los impactos y consecuencias de su p√©rdida.

Este taller se desarrollar√° en l√≠nea utilizando una herramienta de videoconferencia (zoom o googlemeet) y una herramienta colaborativa (Mural.co). La participaci√≥n en este taller requiere una computadora y de preferencia un rta√≥n.. La informaci√≥n de conexi√≥n se enviar√° por correo electr√≥nico antes del taller.

Duraci√≥n : 3h00
15 min Presentaci√≥n del taller + Icebreaker + familiarizaci√≥n con la herramienta Mural
30 min Inicio para comprender el mecanismo de los ecosistemas
75 min Collage de la Biodiversidad, con 5 mazos y 40 tarjetas.
30 min Creatividad, para que tu mural absorba la informaci√≥n
30 min Restituci√≥n, debriefing y debate

title: ONLINE Biodiversity Collage workshop (EN) - with Jim (UK time)
description:
Workshop held in English

The Biodiversity Collage is a playful and cooperative workshop that aims to raise awareness around the stakes of biodiversity collapsing. During this workshop, you will discover the functioning of ecosystems, the part that Biodiversity plays for the Humanity well being, the interactions with human activities and the threat regarding its erosion.
This workshop will be held online using a videoconference tool (zoom) and a collaborative tool (MURAL). The participation to this workshop requires then a computer with a functioning microphone.
The connection info will be sent by email before the workshop.
  The participation to the workshop is under open pricing, starting from 10‚Ç¨. The collected amount will be used to finance the tools of the association "Fresque de la Biodiversit√©", actions to raise awareness as well as the development of the Fresque de la Biodiversit√© network.
  Length : 3h00
15 min Presentation of the workshop + Icebreaker + getting familiar with the tool Mural
30 min Starter to understand the mecanism of the ecosystems
75 min Biodiversity Collage, with 5 decks and 40 cards.
30 min Creativity, to pimp your collage absorb the information
30 min Restitution, debriefing and discussion

title: Circular Challenge online
description: The Circular Challenge is a 1.5h interactive talk to explore resource use, rethink waste, and co-create solutions for a circular future!Discover the Circular Challenge: A Fun & Inspiring Interactive Talk!How can we rethink waste, optimize resource use, and build a more sustainable future? The Circular Challenge is an engaging 1.5-hour interactive session that explores these key questions and empowers you to take action!What will you learn?Why is our current linear economy (take-make-waste) unsustainable?What are the major environmental impacts of our resource consumption?How can businesses, communities, and individuals transition to a circular economy?About the formatUnlike the 3-hour Circular Economy Collage, the Circular Challenge is a shorter, high-energy format that combines expert insights with interactive activities. This conference-style session invites participants to reflect, discuss, and identify concrete solutions adapted to their own challenges.Why join?Get a fast-paced, eye-opening introduction to circular economy principles.Discover real-world examples of innovative circular solutions.Leave inspired and equipped with actionable ideas for your organization or daily life.üîπ A must-attend event for anyone looking to drive positive change‚Äîjoin us!

title: Circular Economy Collage online
description: A fun and educational workshop using collective intelligence to explain the issues surrounding our use of natural resources.Starting hour : 1pm London timeThe Circular Economy Collage will give you a clearer understanding of the issues related to our use of natural resources and to the waste we generate.Which resources do we consume the most and which are most under pressure? What impacts do our consumption and waste generation have on those resources and on the planet in general?How can I contribute to reducing those impacts in my daily life? How can companies evolve their business models?To discover the answers to these and many other questions, come and take part in a workshop of the Circular Economy Collage. The workshop covers topics such as climate change, biodiversity loss, resource scarcity and pollution generated by human activities and enables you to identify concrete courses of action!About the workshopThe Circular Economy Collage is a stimulating, group-based workshop founded on scientific information, which enables participants to grasp the limits of our existing global ‚Äúlinear‚Äù economy and understand the opportunities offered by the circular economy. Inspired by the Climate Fresk, the workshop will allow you to understand the issues surrounding our use of natural resources and our generation and treatment of waste as well as other impacts caused by human activities. The online workshop lasts 3 hours and takes place in groups of 6/7 people with 1 facilitator.Our online Circular Economy Collage workshops are aimed at the general public, and are open to all, whatever your level of knowledge on these subjects. The Collage is also relevant for other audiences such as companies, communities and schools. For our online public workshops, participation is limited to 1 participant per organisation. If several members of your organisation wish to take part, please contact us to organise a dedicated session.Benefits of the workshopHaving deepened your understanding of the limits of the linear production-consumption-waste system, you will discover a more virtuous model for our economy and lots of ways that each of us can save natural resources and produce less waste. You will leave the workshop more aware, better-informed and motivated to take action to "circularise" our system!
